abstract: Mark A. Spilker, the head of Goldman Sachs Asset Management and a member of the firm’s management committee, has abruptly left the Wall Street firm, according to people familiar with the matter. Edward C. Forst, Goldman’s former head of investment management is slated to take over Mr. Spilker’s position, these people said.
snippet: Mark A. Spilker, the head of Goldman Sachs Asset Management and a member of the firm’s management committee, has abruptly left the Wall Street firm, according to people familiar with the matter. Edward C. Forst, Goldman’s former head of investment...
lead_paragraph: Marc A. Spilker, the head of Goldman Sachs Asset Management and a member of Goldman’s management committee, has abruptly left the Wall Street firm, according to internal memorandums obtained by DealBook.

headline.main: Head of Goldman’s Asset Management Leaves
